The Cycle:

Breaking Stigmas & Unlocking the Benefits of the Female Reproductive System with the Sympto-thermal Method of Fertility Awareness

The Cycle was written and illustrated by Groove's CEO, Jennifer Aldoretta. The following excerpts will teach you the basics of practicing the sympto-thermal method of fertility awareness for the purposes of natural birth control, pregnancy assistance, and maintenance of reproductive health. The rest of the book can soon be read or downloaded for free in its entirety.

Chapter 8: Checking Fertility Signals How-To

Chapter 9: Sympto-thermal Method Effectiveness

Appendix A: The Sympto-thermal Method for Contraception

Appendix B: The Sympto-thermal Method for Conception

Appendix C: The Sympto-thermal Method for Reproductive Health

Appendix D: Fertility Awareness and Menstrual Health Resources

Appendix E: Visualizing Cervical Fluid Changes
